in high-climate impact sectors is in a denominator. Moreover, point (c) of this AR clarifies that the
numerator and denominator shall only consist of the proportion of the total final energy
consumption (in the numerator) and net revenue (in the denominator) that are attributable to
activities in high-climate impact sectors. Finally, this point provides that, in effect, there should be
consistency in the scope of both the numerator and denominator.
